Who We Are

The Design Hub Management is a creative tech studio crafting unforgettable digital experiences through intentional design, innovative code, and bold storytelling.The Design Hub Management is a creative tech studio crafting unforgettable digital experiences through intentional design, innovative code, and bold storytelling.

We specialize in UX/UI design, branding, web development, and digital strategy—merging thoughtful design with future-forward technology.

Founded by Zoleka “Zowie” Kubheka, a visionary UX/UI designer and engineer, this studio was created to redefine digital experiences. digital experiences. With an eye for beauty and a mind for systems, Zowie empowers brands to connect, grow, and stand out in a crowded digital space.digital space.

Our work is guided by purpose, powered by creativity, and rooted in innovation. Every pixel, every line of code, and every brand identitywe create is built with care and intention.
